description: Create a tender job schedule shift driver.
permissions: Allowed when TenderJobScheduleShiftPolicy#create? permits the related tender job schedule shift (admin, customer manager for the job customer, broker-shift trucker manager, shift driver/driver, or foreman).
side_effects: Creates a tender job schedule shift driver; after save, enqueues DriverDayRecapPostSchedulerWorker and updates the shift seller_operations_contact when is_primary changes; after create, creates a TenderJobScheduleShiftDriverPartnerAssignmentNotification asynchronously when the driver is not primary.
validation_notes: Requires --tender-job-schedule-shift and --user. User must be unique per tender job schedule shift. The shift must be a broker shift (trucker tender). For broker shifts, the user must have a membership with the seller and not be suspended from driving. User cannot be changed after creation.

flags.name: --tender-job-schedule-shift
flags.description: Tender job schedule shift ID. Example: --tender-job-schedule-shift 123.

flags.name: --user
flags.description: User ID to assign as a driver. Example: --user 456.
